name: Moon Harvest (Wendel Scardua)
description:
You're stranded on a moon colony. You need to work harvesting trigle crystals, a plant-mineral hybrid which grows on this moon's caves. Your parents left a escape pod hidden somewhere, and if only you could find the pieces of the key to it, maybe you could escape this moon and search for them.

Notes:

  • You can use your home to rest - it makes some crops grow again, but it will cost a few credits.
  • If you run out of Oxygen (O2) you will respawn out of the cave
  • If you fall from the cave, you will lose all the trigle you’re carrying

Controls:

A: Jump, interact with map and shop (F key on the embedded emulator)

B: Harvest, pick up key piece, grab rope (D key on the embedded emulator).

Bugfixes:

2023-01-09:

1.0.1 - rebalanced shop prices (it was almost impossible to get the jetpack), added missing Home sfx.

1.0.2 - previous fix missed the increase in trigle's value.
